title: Social Studies Innovation Leadership Course Through Technology Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in Elementary Curriculum Management and Basic Smart Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: A course for school administrators requiring technology integration, developing practical collaboration strategies within limited technological environments.

learning_goals: Learners can create synergy in social studies lesson design by utilizing mobile-based collaboration tools.
Learners can propose three or more instructional strategies to enhance information literacy in resource-constrained technological environments.
Learners can create a technology integration roadmap applicable to school settings based on a teacher-technology expert-librarian collaboration model.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
